reviewText:
Billy Bob Thornton is the all American actor, director, and writer otherwise Arkansas's answer to Orson Welles with Sling Blade. Billy Bob plays two Arkansas husbands and fathers in both films on this DVD.

The first film is an ensemble piece about a dysfunctional Arkansas family with an all star cast with then girlfriend Laura Dern and her mother Diane Ladd playing her mom. Kelly Preston plays her sister. Jim Varney plays Uncle Hazel with a charge of attempted murder. Andy Griffith plays the family patriarch. But the best is Brenda Blethyn as a British psychologist and newest member of the family by marriage. She has the best scenes.

The second film only stars Billy Bob Thornton as a married car salesman in a road trip with his wife played by the late Natasha Richardson in Arkansas and their best friends, Roy and Candy played by Patrick Swayze and Charlize Theron.

Both films are comedies starting Billy Bob. Waking Up in Reno is probably better of the two. The DVD is stated redneck but that's wrongly titled. The DVD has no extras.

If ur a Billy Bob Thornton fan, these r a must see. Very funny. U must let all the credits go up on the first movie to hear the song, "In Spite of Ourselves" by John Prine. He played BBT's brother in the movie. A++++
I like this kind of movie, if you are not into something a little different you probably won't like it
Not into stupid videos so to me these were stupid and useless many people out there like this type of movie just don't expect me to be one of the masses.
bought on a "whim" we laughed our collective a$$eS off very funny.besides the whos who of actors this movie,they all played well off each other

First, I love Billy Bob and had not seen Waking up in Reno.  Daddy & Them is one you can watch over and over again.  Delivery was on time and DVD was in good shape as promised.  Would use seller again.
Good price, speedy delivery, Satisfied customer.
daddy and them is one of the funniest movies we recite from. Billy Bob is  a great actor.
Dvd arrived with scratches on it,  the end of the movie didn't play, so now I don't know how it ends.
The disc was so scratched it couldn't be played. It was a gift so I was not impressed.
Daddy and them is a fun film about a wacky family.  Caution: Lots of F bombs.  Singer John Prine has a part, and sings a song at the end of the credits.
I love Daddy and Them and have watched over and over
